definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)

sentences.english: Alter the pitch, pan, tempo, volumes etc.
sentences.chinese: 改变音高，声像，节奏，数量等。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate echography appearances and diagnosis value of congenital abnormal of the eyeball wall.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨眼球壁先天异常声像学表现及其诊断价值。

sentences.english: Methods The ultrasonic imaging features of 22 cases patients with imperforate hymen were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法分析22例处女膜闭锁的声像图特征。

sentences.english: Sonographic features of 22 cases with liver alveolar hydatidosis were reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文报告22例肝泡状棘球蚴病的声像图表现。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the features of ultrasound imaging of adenomyosis so as to raise the ultrasound diagnostic rate.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨子宫腺肌病的声像图特征，提高超声诊断率。

sentences.english: In this paper an appropriate program, based on the principle of the image moded method is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 本文根据声像模型提出一适宜的算法。

sentences.english: Familiarity with the appearance of this artefact will help sonographers to avoid diagnostic errors.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉环状软骨侧边声像，可助超声诊断医师避免误诊。

sentences.english: A tape for recording sounds and images.
sentences.chinese: 请问这种声像带多少钱一盘？

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the characteristics of secondary intussusceptions on ultrasonography.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨继发性肠套叠的声像图特点。

sentences.english: Objective To describe the features of endometriosis to abdominal wall scar on ultrasonography.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腹壁瘢痕子宫内膜异位症的声像图特征。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the approach of ultrasound diagnosis of the placental abruption and the characteristic of acoustic images and graphs.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胎盘早剥的超声诊断方法及声像图特征。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse the characteristics of ultrasound of acute appendicitis diverticulitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨急性阑尾憩室炎的声像图特点。

sentences.english: ConclusionsHemimegalencephaly has characteristic ultrasound imaging and can be diagnosed by prenatal sonography.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨半侧巨脑畸形胎儿的产前超声声像图特征。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the ultrasonic features and clinical manifestations of unilateral renal purpura.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨局限性肾紫癜的超声声像图特征。

sentences.english: It also included readings, and audio and video clips to teach and reinforce its messages.
sentences.chinese: 其也包括用阅读，声像剪辑去教会和增强其信息。

sentences.english: These factors introduce colourations that muddy the sound image.
sentences.chinese: 这些因素导致了污染声像的染色效应。

definition: Dongdong, cheerleading mascot of 2008 Beijing Olympics
